statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_evaluations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, student_id, rating FROM feedback_evaluations WHERE course_id = 'abcd-1234';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_evaluations WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_evaluations WHERE student_id = 'xyz-5678' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feedback_evaluations;
SELECT * FROM feedback_evaluations WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, student_id, course_id, rating FROM feedback_evaluations WHERE student_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT student_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback_evaluations GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(id) AS num_evaluations FROM feedback_evaluations GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY num_evaluations DESC;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating, MIN(rating) AS lowest_rating FROM feedback_evaluations;
SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, student_id, course_id FROM Feedback WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, course_id FROM Feedback WHERE course_id = 456;
SELECT feedback_text, student_id FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM Evaluation WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback_id, student_id, course_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_id, student_id, course_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Evaluation WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM Evaluation GROUP BY student_id, course_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT student_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE evaluation_score > 3;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM course_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM student_table WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, course_name, course_code, course_description FROM course_table WHERE id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE evaluation_score > 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student_table WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM course_table WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE evaluation_score < 2 ORDER BY student_id, course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE evaluation_score BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY course_id, evaluation_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT student_name, course_name, feedback_text FROM students JOIN feedback ON students.student_id = feedback.student_id;
SELECT * FROM courses
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM feedback INNER JOIN students ON feedback.student_id = students.student_id
SELECT course_name, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM evaluations GROUP BY course_name
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, description FROM Course WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Student ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM Course LEFT JOIN Feedback ON Course.course_id = Feedback.course_id GROUP BY Course.course_name HAVING feedback_count > 5;
SELECT criteria_name, weightage FROM EvaluationCriteria WHERE weightage >= 0.5 ORDER BY weightage ASC;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE course_duration > 10 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, full_name, email FROM Student WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY full_name;
SELECT c.course_name, f.rating, f.comment FROM Course c JOIN Feedback f ON c.course_id = f.course_id WHERE f.rating >= 4 ORDER BY f.rating DESC;

SELECT e.criteria_name, er.score, s.full_name FROM EvaluationCriteria e JOIN EvaluationResult er ON e.criteria_id = er.criteria_id JOIN Student s ON er.student_id = s.student_id WHERE er.score > 80 ORDER BY s.full_name, e.criteria_name;

SELECT c.course_name, COUNT(f.feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM Course c LEFT JOIN Feedback f ON c.course_id = f.course_id GROUP BY c.course_name HAVING feedback_count > 0 ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
